alert.note: Alert for Ringgold (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 10:00PM CDT until September 17 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ringgold County in south central Iowa... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Irena, or 14 miles southwest of Mount Ayr, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Redding around 1010 PM CDT. Maloy around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Delphos, Benton, Mount Ayr and Mt Ayr Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
